A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I will never not go see a star wars movie... But I left the theater feeling like my favorite childhood fantasy got stepped on.
They trashed a beloved character and highlighted some new character that were completely pointless making the entire thing just odd at best.

There is a petition to remove this film from cannon\, please consider signing it if you are serious star wars fan.

I'd give this less than 1 star but rotten tomatoes doesn't count anything less than 1.
